entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Risk of thunderstorms this afternoon. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 this morning. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind light except northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 through mainland inlets and valleys. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
